Class MyNotificationsAdapter.ViewHolder

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.support.v7.widget.RecyclerView.ViewHolder
      • com.usal.jorgeav.sportapp.adapters.MyNotificationsAdapter.ViewHolder
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.view.View.OnClickListener, android.view.View.OnLongClickListener
    Enclosing class:
    MyNotificationsAdapter

    public class MyNotificationsAdapter.ViewHolder
extends android.support.v7.widget.RecyclerView.ViewHolder
implements android.view.View.OnClickListener, android.view.View.OnLongClickListener
    Representa cada una de las celdas que el adaptador mantiene para la coleccion
